message: Is there something important not included in the list?

I read http://webtrends.about.com/od/wiki/a/business-wiki.htm and found this list f different use cases of corporate wikis interesting. in the post Daniel Nations mentions these different kinds of corporate wikis:
The World Wide Wiki (global internal communication), 
The Wiki Knowledge Base, 
The Wiki Meeting (enhancing or even replacing meetings), 
Wiki Project Organization (centralize the information and organization of an entire project), 
Wiki Documentation (wikis - simple, easy-to-use collaborate documentation engine);
